TopicTitle: KSP 1.0 Graphics settings for low end laptop

Articles.Content:
Hi,

before the update, I had graphics settings set up so that the game would run smoothly. Since the update, I can't find a configuration that would give me decent fps.

Could someone with similar specs post their settings?

My laptop specs are:

Core i5-4210

Integrated graphics Intel HD 4400

4 GB memory.

I'm sorry if this is not the correct section of the forum, but I need help!

Hi tokodan, you can try lower maxSubdivisions in the settings.cfg, for example:


TERRAIN
{
	preset = High
	version = 1.0.2
	PRESET
	{
		name = Low
		PLANET
		{
			name = Kerbin
			minDistance = 2
			minSubdivision = 1
			maxSubdivision = 3
		}
		PLANET
		{
			name = KerbinOcean
			minDistance = 2
			minSubdivision = 1
			maxSubdivision = 3
		}
I find on my laptop that the bottleneck is terrain detail, though dropping rendering quality helps too.
